metadata.title: CVE-2024-56546 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drivers: soc: xilinx: add the missing kfree in xlnx_add_cb_for_suspend()If we fail to allocate memory for cb_data by kmalloc, the memoryallocation for eve_data is never freed, add the missing kfree()in the error handling path.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
